summary: Website project to build a new website (domain validation constraints noted).
architectural_notes: Domain input must be 5â€“50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no dots/prefix like www.).
known_issues: Domain entry 'www.uthaansewasamiti.org' fails validation due to invalid characters/format (contains dots).

existing_features.title: Ensure the website is fully accessible as a deployed live site on the Internet Computer, with working navigation for the existing routes (Home, About Us, Projects, Gallery, Contact, Admin Login, Admin Dashboard) using the current hash-based routing setup.

Fix the custom domain input/validation so that a fully qualified domain name containing dots (e.g., "www.uthaansewasamiti.org") is accepted, or provide a clear, user-facing English validation message that explains the exact allowed format and how to enter a valid domain for publishing.

Ensure the header logo image reference ("/assets/generated/uthaan-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png") is present in the deployed frontend assets, or add a safe fallback rendering so the header does not show a broken image if the asset is missing.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website for the user (create and publish a site).

projectName: Publish the website live and resolve custom-domain validation
